trans-unit.source: Retrieves a pointer to the buffer bitmap if the buffer is a device-independent bitmap (DIB)

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the address of the buffer bitmap pixels, @extended flag will contain the width of the buffer bitmap, in pixels.

trans-unit.source: 0 and sets the @error flag to non-zero, @extended flag may contain the HRESULT error code.
